Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    processing.core.PApplet.ARGS_PRESENT
    use --full-screen instead.
    processing.core.PApplet.firstMouse
    Please refrain from using this variable, it will be removed from future releases of Processing because it cannot be used consistently across platforms and input methods.
    processing.core.PApplet.online
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    processing.core.PApplet.arraycopy(Object, int, Object, int, int)
    Use arrayCopy() instead.
    processing.core.PApplet.arraycopy(Object, Object)
    Use arrayCopy() instead.
    processing.core.PApplet.arraycopy(Object, Object, int)
    Use arrayCopy() instead.
    processing.core.PFont.getFont()
    processing.core.PImage.getImage()
    processing.core.PVector.heading2D()
    processing.core.PApplet.link(String, String)
    the 'target' parameter is no longer relevant with the removal of applets
    processing.core.PImage.mask(int[])
    processing.core.PApplet.openStream(String)
    As of release 0136, use createInput() instead.
    processing.core.PApplet.param(String)
    no more applet support
    processing.core.PApplet.registerDispose(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.registerDraw(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.registerKeyEvent(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.registerMouseEvent(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.registerPost(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.registerPre(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.registerSize(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.status(String)
    no more applet support
    processing.core.PApplet.unregisterDispose(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.unregisterDraw(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.unregisterKeyEvent(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.unregisterMouseEvent(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.unregisterPost(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.unregisterPre(Object)
    processing.core.PApplet.unregisterSize(Object)
